settings.heading: Brage: The Idea, The Origin
settings.description: At our core, we're dreamers and doers, committed to bringing innovation and quality to the arena of automotive industry. We take pride in being car architects, transforming cars from simpletons to show-stoppers that scream strength and style as they cruise. We blend precision and aesthetics to elevate the visual appeal and performance of automobiles. With us, it's not just about parts, it's about possibilities.

Our Story

Brage, named after the Norse god of strength and creativity, embodies innovation and progress. In 2019, two passionate car enthusiasts came together to build an immersive automotive experience. They led a collaborative effort to integrate styling parts in cars that drives performance and innovation forward.

We also have an exclusive collection of pre-owned cars which are carefully crafted and modified to captivate your senses ensuring an unparalleled driving experience that exceeds expectations. Check out the pre-owned cars under our dealership here.

At our core, we're dreamers and doers, committed to bringing innovation and quality to the arena of automotive industry. We take pride in being car architects, transforming cars from simpletons to show-stoppers that scream strength and style as they cruise. We blend precision and aesthetics to elevate the visual appeal and performance of automobiles. With us, it's not just about parts, it's about possibilities.

They led a collaborative effort to integrate styling parts in cars that drives performance and innovation forward.
